p: In his COP26 speech, former US President Barack Obama referred to ‘cynicism as the recourse of cowards’. He underlined the need for empathy and perseverance as vital components in addressing the complicated issues involved and suggested that everything was not as clear-cut as some might suggest. He suggested that the young renewable energy leaders, fighters, and doers need to dispense with cynicism; and rather transform their anger and respond to adversities with kindness, innovative approaches, and enthusiasm.
